CustomField.description: When checked, the customer will have access restricted if the downloadable file has been accessed more than the allowed amount defined in the "Maximum Number of Downloads" field. Defaults unchecked.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When checked, the customer will have access restricted if the downloadable file has been accessed more than the allowed amount defined in the "Maximum Number of Downloads" field. Defaults unchecked.
CustomField.label: Restrict Number of Downloads
